titles.title: This Is The Air I Breathe

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the air I breathe
This is the air I breathe
Your Holy presence, living in me.
This is my daily bread.
This is my daily bread.
Your very word, spoken to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And I, I'm desperate for You. And I, I'm lost without You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tu eres mi aire Señor
Tu eres mi aire Señor
Tu santa presencia viviendo en mi

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/Tu eres mi pan de hoy/ (2)
Tu santa palabra hablando en mi

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Yo necesito de ti
Yo perdido estoy, sin ti
